name: Change subscription (HTTP Connector)
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

properties.label: Connect last proccessed version ID c
properties.name: ConnectLastProccessedVersionId__c

extended_input_schema.name: array_path
extended_input_schema.label: Array path
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the array that contains your records' unique identifier and/or last_modified_at timestamps. Then, identify the specific variables which correspond to that identifier or timestamp.

extended_input_schema.name: key1
extended_input_schema.label: ID column
extended_input_schema.hint: Select a variable that is your records' unique identifier. Required both for processing new or new/updated events. The recipe will use this ID to carry out deduplication by ensuring it processes each unique record only once.

extended_input_schema.name: key2
extended_input_schema.label: Timestamp column
extended_input_schema.hint: Select a variable that is your records' last_modified_at timestamp. Required if processing new/updated events. The recipe will use the ID together with the timestamp to carry out deduplication by ensuring it processes each unique record only if it has gotten modified again.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
